content: car sun visor pouch thank you for your interest in my pattern this pattern has not been tested so if you find typographical or numerical errors please inform me so i can correct it i can be contacted via facebook or instagram happy hooking designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items finished size ~5 wide x ~8 long materials worsted weight #4 yarn o 150 yards 4mm hook needle scissors gauge not necessary but your finished size may vary stitches us terms slip_stitch -slip_stitch st -stitch chain -chain single_crochet -single_crochet double_crochet -double_crochet fptc -front post treble/triple crochet flo -front loop only blo -back loop only pattern notes this pattern is constructed in 2 steps main body & four straps # st means one st in each stitch for # stitches # st means # of st in same st # at end of each row is the stitch count not including any chain s chain 2 counts as stitch designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items main body row 1 in magic_ring chain 4 counts as double_crochet + chain 2 *3 double_crochet chain 2* 3 times 2 double_crochet join to 2nd chain of chain 4 slip_stitch to space turn 12 r2 chain 2 counts as double_crochet 2 double_crochet in same space *in next space 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet * 3 times in next space 3 double_crochet chain 2 slip_stitch to top of chain 2 turn 24 r3 slip_stitch to space chain 2 counts as double_crochet 2 double_crochet in same space in next space between clusters 3 double_crochet in next chain space 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in next space between clusters 3 double_crochet in next chain space 3 double_crochet turn 18 r4 chain 2 counts as double_crochet *in next space between clusters 3 double_crochet * 2 times in next chain space 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet *in next space between clusters 3 double_crochet * 2 times double_crochet in top of chain 2 turn 20 r5 chain 2 counts as double_crochet fptc around middle double_crochet from 1st cluster from r3 double_crochet in space *in next space between clusters double_crochet fptc around middle double_crochet from cluster from r3 double_crochet * 2 times in next chain space 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet *in next space between clusters double_crochet fptc around middle double_crochet from cluster from r3 double_crochet * 2 times in next space between clusters double_crochet fptc around middle double_crochet from cluster from r3 double_crochet in top of chain 2 turn 24 r6 chain 2 counts as double_crochet *in next space between clusters 3 double_crochet * 3 times in next chain space 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet *in next space between clusters 3 double_crochet * 3 times double_crochet on top of chain 2 turn 26 r7 chain 2 counts as double_crochet fptc around middle st from cluster from r5 double_crochet in space *in next space between clusters double_crochet fptc around middle st from cluster from r5 double_crochet * 3
